backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Review the materials for my meeting with senior leadership and suggest the best way to summarize the topics into three main discussion points. Generate any objections or concerns that might come up and give me effective responses.

gutts.name: Meeting Materials Retrieval
gutts.capability: Access and load all relevant documents for the meeting
gutts.user_goal: System has all materials to analyze
gutts.evidence: Retrieved 5 documents: Q4 strategy deck, budget proposal, market analysis, competitive review, product roadmap

gutts.name: Content Analysis & Topic Extraction
gutts.capability: Identify main themes and topics across materials
gutts.evidence: Extracted 8 topics: Q4 revenue growth, new product launch, budget increase, team expansion, market positioning, competitor threats, technology investments, customer retention

gutts.name: Executive Summary Distillation
gutts.capability: Condense complex topics into 3 concise discussion points
gutts.evidence: 3 discussion points: (1) Q4 Growth Strategy & Revenue Targets, (2) Product Innovation & Competitive Positioning, (3) Resource Investment Priorities

gutts.name: Audience-Aware Framing
gutts.capability: Frame discussion points appropriate for senior leadership
gutts.evidence: Framed with executive focus: business impact, risk mitigation, competitive advantage, ROI, strategic alignment

gutts.name: Objection Anticipation
gutts.capability: Predict concerns or pushback from senior leaders
gutts.evidence: Anticipated objections: (1) 'Budget too high given market uncertainty', (2) 'Product launch timeline too aggressive', (3) 'Team expansion not justified'

gutts.name: Response Preparation
gutts.capability: Generate effective responses to anticipated objections
gutts.evidence: Response to budget objection: 'Budget increase is 15% but projected revenue growth is 30%; ROI analysis shows break-even in Q2; competitors investing 20% more'

gutts.name: Briefing Document Generation
gutts.capability: Format summary, objections, and responses into prep document
gutts.user_goal: Comprehensive prep materials ready to review
gutts.evidence: Generated executive briefing: 3 discussion points with supporting data, 5 anticipated objections with responses, appendix with detailed analysis

notes: Generated by GPT-5 - Matches reference decomposition of 7 GUTTs
